resources.string: I'm often told: "The best way to resolve one's problems is to forget them. "
What do I want to forget?
In spite of my efforts, only time can erase memories.

Everything is so unstable around me. Changing. Moving. I\'ve become disorientated. Yet everyone tells me: “You have to adapt”. Be mobile. Flexible. Time is accelerating and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'m behind the times.Come on, move on. I have to adapt…
Everything is so unstable around me.
Everything is so changing around me.

At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'m not from my time.

Time is accelerating … and you have to move with the times. Network, speed, mobility. Here are the keywords. But everything goes too fast. I can\'t relate the story of my life anymore. At least not in a linear way. I go off the track. I might not have the right profile (or so my online friends say about me). I\'mbehind the times. Come on, move on. I have to adapt…
Je dois être plus dynamique. Il faut que je me secoue ... ou du moins que je secoue mon téléphone pour faire changer les choses.
Tout semble opaque. Je cherche un éclairage pour trouver ma voie.
J\'ai peur de ne pas savoir m\'adapter, mais je dois avant tout changer de cadre pour le découvrir, agrandir mon champs de vue...
Que peut signifier agir dans le milieu numérique de l\'interactivité compulsive ? La création numérique "Agir" propose quatre expériences interactives : s\'adapter, agiter, éclairer et effacer.
